items.name: Angler Cap
items.desc: This helmet resembles an anglerfish's lure. Maybe I could use it as a torch of some sort.

items.name: Flippers
items.desc: These flippers should let me swim a little higher. Maybe I can squeeze into small spaces with this

items.name: Propeller
items.desc: This propeller seems powerful. I shouldn't need to push off the ground to jump anymore.

items.name: Pressure Suit
items.desc: This pressure suit should let me go past those yellow airlocks.

items.name: Bubble Beam
items.desc: This beam fits perfectly onto my suit. These bubbles should be able to trigger blue doors and fend off enemies
